disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is provided for informational and general guidance purposes only. It should not be considered as professional advice. Consult a certified architect or local building authority for detailed planning and compliance with legal norms.
disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: The information provided here does not constitute legally binding advice, and you are advised to consult professionals for all final architectural decisions.

rooms.description: An open area with a welcoming entrance, integrated living space for casual gatherings.
Spacious dining area adjacent to the kitchen, with natural light.
Modern kitchen design with open storage and efficient layout. Includes space for appliances.
Two-car garage with ample parking, adjacent to the main entrance. Designed for ease of access.
